reviewText: Description sounded like these videos would add something to our technique & knowledge gained through over 30 years of non-adventurous vanilla sex. Waste of money. Two disks are basically group sex therapy sessions with 3 or 4 couples talking about how much they liked each other. I've learned more from the erotica fiction I've read. This set should not be billed as a way for us baby boomers to learn how to adjust to the difference between sex when we were twenty-something and sex in our 60's when health and mobility issues can begin to cramp our style. The producers obviously knew many of us were naive and sexually uneducated most of our lives; but, hey, we're living 80 or 90+ now.  When I'm bed hopping in an Assisted Living community sometime in the future, some knowledge of adaptive techniques & how to add a fillip of spice would be nice, instead of the same-oh same-oh slobber, groping, & wham-bam.

Is so easy to relax waching this.
We do enjoyed every single time.
Tks for details. Is realy great. W
